front.title: An Information Model for Basic Network Policy

abstract.t: This document defines the I2RS Policy-Based Routing (PBR) policy information model describing I2RS interactions with the PBR in a routing system. The PBR IM uses Policy Core Information Model (PCIM) framework (RFC3060, RFC3460, and RFC3644) to specify the ordered route list within the PBR RIB adapted to I2RS.
